content: does somebody know how to run the tests in src/test/rustfix?

in #88369 I changed a bunch of revisions in const generics tests and to not have any stale stderr files and stuff, I removed all files with *.stderr, *.stdout and *.fixed. The test suite still passes even without any *.fixed files in src/test/rustfix which seems weird.

It looks like the src/test/rustfix directory is vestigial and broken. When rustfix was first introduced in #50084, there was a separate directory for them. But in commit 6f2d023028bbd666be2c211b923b32faf10a41da they were moved to src/test/ui, but the originals weren't removed. I have posted #88387 to remove them.
